text: Tomella is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Clavatulidae. This name is no longer valid as it is a junior homonym of Tomella Robineau-Desvoidy, 1830 (order Diptera). It has been replaced by Tomellana (Wenz, 1943). ==Species== ;Species brought into synonymy: * Tomella hupferi Strebel, 1912: synonym of Tomellana hupferi (Strebel, 1912) * Tomella leschkei Strebel, 1912: synonym of Tomellana leschkei (Strebel, 1912) * Tomella pfefferi Strebel, 1912: synonym of Clavatula pfefferi (Strebel, 1912) ==References== Category:Clavatulidae
title: Tomella
